Package com.googlecode.flyway.core.util

Private API: No compatibility guarantees provided.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ClassPathResource A resource on the classpath.
ClassUtils Utility methods for dealing with classes.
DateUtils Utility methods for dealing with dates.
ExceptionUtils Utility class for dealing with exceptions.
FeatureDetector Detects whether certain features are available or not.
FileCopyUtils Utility class for copying files and their contents.
MetaDataTableRowDumper Dumps migrations in an ascii-art table in the logs and the console.
ObjectUtils Collection of utility methods for dealing with objects.
PropertiesUtils Utility for dealing with property files.
StopWatch Stop watch, inspired by the implementation in the Spring framework.
StringUtils Various string-related utilities.
TimeFormat Formats execution times.
